'''Ban(a)''' is a [[Westron]] word meaning ''half''.

The element is seen in compounds. It usually is followed by an ''a'' but it is not known if it belongs to the full form of the word [[Asterisk|*]]''bana''.
==Etymology==
The word seems to come from and [[Adûnaic]] element, like some root *BAN. 

Cf. [[Adûnaic]] ''[[banâth]]'' "wife" that would mean "the half of the couple"
== Examples ==
*[[Banakil]]
*[[Banazîr]]
*[[Bannâtha]] (probable)

==Cognates==
*[[Sindarin]] ''[[perin]]''
